-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Open a web browser from Haskell.
--   
--   Open a web browser from Haskell. Currently BSD, Linux, OS X and
--   Windows are supported.
@package open-browser
@version 0.2.1.0

module Web.Browser

-- | <a>openBrowser</a> opens a URL in the user's preferred web browser.
--   Returns whether or not the operation succeeded.
openBrowser :: String -> IO Bool
